resources.string: Tap this card to start trying glasses onto your face in real-time.

Engr. Dr. Muhammad Jamil khan
\nAssistant Professor
\nDepartment of Telecommunication Engineering
We need you to allow storage permission for reading image. Kindly allow this app to access storage.

We\'re unable to request permission for accessing storage, maybe you\'ve disabled it. Please go to Settings then Permission Section and allow this app to access storage for the smooth flow of application.
